comment: The professor is very strict and not the nicest. She tore my essays apart, which were very hard, leaving me feeling defeated. She taught well and boosted my grade at the end with extra credit, but that's it. I would not recommend taking her.

Worse class I ever had especially had difficulty with the essays. Her rubric weren't clear and we had a meeting for every essay but even with that it wasn't much help. This class had me stressing all semester and the way she wanted her essays were pretty difficult if you are not a strong writer.
